channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: First Post
item.description: Inspired by Yihui Xie’s blogdown package I have jumped into the world of blogging. Going over the presentations from Rstudio::conf I have become motivated to start documenting my R journey and and share some of my work. I am often asked by colleagues at other organisations how I do something in R so I’m hoping this will provide an easier format to share and explain some of my work. Right now it’s very basic but as I learn more about the Yihui’s blogdown package I’m sure this space will expand.

item.title: Working with Report Card Data - Renaming Columns
About
item.description: I’m the System Research Leader and Managing Information for Student Achievement (MISA) lead at the Grand Erie District School Board in south-western Ontario. My interests include data visualisation, program evaluation and knowledge mobilisation. I am currently active in research networks across the province of Ontario including the Data User Group and London Region MISA Profession Network.
